text: Damnation Alley is a 1977 American science fiction movie directed by Jack Smight and based on the 1969 novel of the same name by Roger Zelazny. It stars Jan-Michael Vincent, George Peppard, Dominique Sanda, Paul Winfield, Jackie Earle Haley and Murray Hamilton and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Smight Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Utah Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American road movies Category:1970s road movies Category:Movies about the United States Air Force Category:Movies composed by Jerry Goldsmith Category:Movies set in deserts Category:American disaster movies Category:Movies about nuclear war and weapons
title: Damnation Alley
